attributes.action: Increase bus services between Uttoxeter Bus (& rail) stations to Alton Towers
attributes.background: In a county where public and Eco-friendly transport are promoted, it seems that one of the most vital tourist attractions in the whole region is getting ever more difficult to commute to using public transport. Instead tourists are paying for expensive alternatives such as taxi.

rejection.details: Local bus services are not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. You could raise this issue with the local council.
